Ok folks-in my career as a RN I have administered many vaccines, IV, IM and oral medications.  Anytime a any of the above contains an additive that causes an allergic reaction in many people there is prominent warning, EASY To Spot. Protocol for the COVID vaccine is that people with NO type of allergic history must wait 15 min after receiving the shot.
